Package org.thewhitemage13.interfaces

Interface UserServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserServiceInterface
Interface for user service operations.

This interface defines a variety of methods to manage users, including registering new users, updating profiles, fetching user details, and verifying user status. It handles operations such as adding users, deleting users, and managing user subscriptions.

Key Methods:

  • addUsers(List) adds a list of new users, ensuring all data is validated.
  • getUsernameById(Long) retrieves a user's username by their ID.
  • openUser(Long) retrieves a userâ€™s public profile details.
  • getUserById(Long) fetches detailed user information based on their ID.
  • getUsersByIds(List) retrieves a list of users by their IDs.
  • userVerification(Long) checks if a user exists or is active.
  • registerNewUser(CreateUserDTO) registers a new user, validating and storing their details.
  • updateUserProfile(Long, CreateUserDTO) updates an existing user's profile details.
  • getInformationAboutUser(String) retrieves user information by their username.
  • deleteUser(Long) deletes a user account by their ID.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • addUsers

      void addUsers(List<CreateUserDTO> users) throws com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Adds a list of new users after validating the provided user data.

      This method processes a list of users, validating their details (e.g., phone number format) and adds them to the system after validation. If any userâ€™s data is invalid, an exception will be thrown.

      Parameters:
      users - a list of CreateUserDTO objects containing the new users' data
      Throws:
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if a phone number is invalid or cannot be parsed

    • getUsernameById

      String getUsernameById(Long userId)
      Retrieves the username associated with a given user ID.

      This method returns the username of the user associated with the provided ID.

      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID for which to fetch the username
      Returns:
      the username of the user with the specified ID

    • openUser

      OpenUserDTO openUser(Long userId)
      Retrieves the public profile information of a user by their ID.

      This method returns an OpenUserDTO containing publicly available details about the user such as the username, profile picture URL, post count, follower count, and media URLs.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose public profile is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an OpenUserDTO containing the user's public profile data

    • getUserById

      GetUserDTO getUserById(Long userId)
      Retrieves detailed user information by their ID.

      This method returns a GetUserDTO containing all available details about the user, such as their email, phone number, and profile information.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose details are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a GetUserDTO containing the userâ€™s information

    • getUsersByIds

      List<org.thewhitemage13.dto.UserSubscriptionDTO> getUsersByIds(List<Long> userIds)
      Retrieves detailed information for a list of users by their IDs.

      This method returns a list of UserSubscriptionDTO objects for each user in the provided list of IDs.

      Parameters:
      userIds - a list of user IDs to retrieve information for
      Returns:
      a list of UserSubscriptionDTO objects containing the information of the requested users

    • userVerification

      boolean userVerification(Long userId)
      Verifies if a user exists or is active.

      This method checks if the user with the given ID exists in the system and is active.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to verify
      Returns:
      true if the user exists and is active, otherwise false

    • registerNewUser

      void registerNewUser(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO) throws UsernameIsBusyException, EmailAlreadyTakenException, EmailBusyException, com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Registers a new user by validating and saving their data.

      This method processes the provided user data, ensuring that there are no conflicts with existing usernames or email addresses before registering the new user.

      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the DTO containing the data of the user to be registered
      Throws:
      UsernameIsBusyException - if the username is already taken
      EmailAlreadyTakenException - if the email is already registered
      EmailBusyException - if the email is in use for another account
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number is invalid or cannot be parsed

    • updateUserProfile

      void updateUserProfile(Long userId, CreateUserDTO createUserDTO) throws UsernameIsBusyException, org.thewhitemage13.exception.UserNotFoundException, EmailAlreadyTakenException, EmailBusyException, com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Updates an existing userâ€™s profile data.

      This method updates the userâ€™s profile, including username, email, and other details. It will check if the provided details are valid and if there are any conflicts with other users.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose profile is to be updated
      createUserDTO - the new user profile data
      Throws:
      UsernameIsBusyException - if the username is already taken by another user
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user with the given ID is not found
      EmailAlreadyTakenException - if the email is already taken by another user
      EmailBusyException - if the email is currently in use
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number is invalid or cannot be parsed

    • getInformationAboutUser

      GetUserDTO getInformationAboutUser(String username) throws org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves user information based on their username.

      This method fetches a userâ€™s information (such as their email, profile, etc.) by their username.

      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      a GetUserDTO containing the user's information
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found with the given username

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(Long userId) throws org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException
      Deletes a user based on their ID.

      This method deletes the user account corresponding to the provided ID, including all associated data.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to be deleted
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user with the given ID is not found
